cards.rules_text: When Perilous Analyst dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

Emerge {4}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.)[/i]
Writhing Lasher enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if it emerged.
{B}, Exile a card from a graveyard: Empty Husk gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Unequal Twins enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.
{1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Unequal Twins: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

Augmented Specimen enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
Remove two +1/+1 counters from Augmented Specimen: Augmented Specimen gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
When Synapse Parasite dies, draw a card.
{G}, Sacrifice Shambling Nest: Create three tapped 1/1 green Fungus Insect Mutant creature tokens.
Bifurcated Behemoth can only be blocked by exactly two creatures.

Trample
When Genetic Waste enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature. If you do, put two +1/+1 counters on Genetic Waste.
Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Durable Host. This ability triggers only once each turn.

Haste
{2}{R}: Diverge 3/3 [i](If this creature isn’t a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 3/3 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Sclerotic Stalker has menace as long as you control two or more Mutants.
Whenever Sclerotic Stalker deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
{4}{R}: Diverge 6/3 [i](If this creature isn’t a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 6/3 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)[/i]
{T}, Sacrifice Sporebone Shambler: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast a noncreature spell.
When Flayed Prodigy enters the battlefield, it deals damage equal to the number of Mutants you control to target player or planeswalker.

{4}{U}: Diverge 4/4 [i](If this creature isn’t a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 4/4 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Whenever Miserable Hybrid attacks, up to one other Mutant you control gains flying until end of turn.

Whenever Stretched Aberration deals combat damage to an opponent, you may return it to its owner’s hand.
Fatalistic Escapee has first strike as long as it’s your turn.

Lifelink
Whenever Hazard Researcher becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Flying
When Passive Broodsire enters the battlefield, if you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn, create a 1/1 colorless Survivor creature token.
You may cast Sudden Symbiote as though it had flash as long as you’ve cast a noncreature spell this turn.
When Impassive Observer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gains indestructible until end of turn.

Emerge {5}{W} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.)[/i]
Destroy target creature if it attacked during its controller’s last turn or if one of its abilities was activated during its controller’s last turn.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can’t attack or block, can’t diverge, and can’t be sacrificed to pay for spells’ costs.
Destroy target Aura, Equipment, or Mutant.
Exile target enchantment. You gain 3 life.
When Security Personnel enters the battlefield, if it had a spell implanted into it, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

When Irradiated Inspector enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

When Genome Tester enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a card with implant from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Flash
Emerge {1}{W}{W} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature’s mana value.)[/i]

Flash
When Extraction Squad enters the battlefield, you may return up to two target creatures you control to their owners’ hands.

Flying
When Sinuous Supplicant enters the battlefield, return target nonland permanent card with mana value 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

This spell costs {1} less to cast if a creature you control died this turn.
Create two 1/1 colorless Survivor creature tokens, then put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Create an X/X black Germ creature token, where X is the number of creatures you control.

When Quality Control enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Quality Control leaves the battlefield. If that permanent was a creature, you gain X life, where X is the number of creature types it had, up to a maximum of 5.
Create a 1/1 colorless Survivor creature token, then put a +1/+1 counter on each Survivor you control.

Equipped creature has first strike and “{1}{W}, Unattach Synthetic Limb: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn.”
Equip {2}

Your opponents can’t cast noncreature spells this turn.
Implant {2}{W} [i](As you cast a creature spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its implant cost. If you do, that spell gains “When this creature enters the battlefield” and this card’s effects.)[/i]
Target creature gets +0/+3 until end of turn. Then target player mills X cards, where X is that creature’s toughness.

Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell.
• Counter target creature spell if it has a spell implanted into it.
Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}. If you control a creature with three or more creature types, instead counter that spell unless its controller pays {4}.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature’s base power is 0. If it’s a Mutant, instead its base power is 4.

This spell costs {1} less to cast if it targets a Mutant.
Return target creature to its owner’s hand.

Enchant creature
When Critical Analysis enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature if there are five or more cards in its controller’s graveyard. 
Enchanted creature doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.

Draw a card.

As long as Dessicated Apostle is a Mutant, creatures you control with three or more creature types have ward {2}.

Whenever Hardwired Subject becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, untap it.
{T}: Untap target permanent not named Hardwired Subject. Activate only as a sorcery.
Whenever Engineered Lamprey becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, you may pay {U}. If you do, draw a card.

Flying
Other Mutants you control have flying.

{12}{U}: Diverge 8/8. This ability costs {X} less to activate, where X is the greatest number of cards in an opponent’s graveyard. [i](If this creature isn’t a Mutant, its base power and toughness become 8/8 and it becomes a Mutant in addition to its other types. Diverge only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Flash
When Membranous Maiden enters the battlefield, any number of target creatures you control each get +0/+1 until end of turn.

Whenever Caul Tyrant becomes the target of a spell or ability you control, each opponent mills three cards.
{1}{U}: Another target creature you control gets +0/+2 until end of turn.
Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller’s graveyard.

Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If the revealed card has three or more creature types, you gain 2 life.
Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don’t untap during that player’s next untap step. Mutants you control gain hexproof until end of turn.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library and you draw a card.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, remove two counters from a permanent you control or pay 2 life.
Draw two cards.

As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard.
Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. If the additional cost wasn’t paid, you lose life equal to that permanent’s mana value.

Remove all counters from target permanent. Then if that permanent is a creature, it gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. That creature is a Mutant in addition to its other types.
All creatures with no counters on them get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. If the chosen card had three or more creature types, each opponent mills three cards.

{W}{U} ENHANCEMENT Target your own creatures to create the perfect specimen.
{U}{B} MILL The mind is a wonderful thing to waste.
{B}{R} COUNTERS Experiment on your victims with additional counters.
{R}{G} SACRIFICE Science demands a heavy price sometimes. Let others pay it.
{G}{W} IMPLANT Graft strange new abilities onto your creatures.
{W}{B} GRAVEYARD Not all specimens survive. But all of them serve a purpose.
{B}{G} EMERGE Use creatures to fuel bigger monsters as the game goes on.
{G}{U} SPECIATION Embrace variety and be rewarded for multiple creature types.
{U}{R} MUTANTS Born or created, gather your mutant coterie and thrive.
{R}{W} SPELLS Some subjects respond well to stimulus. Cast spells and find out.
